He's disillusioned with the dull mountain of virtue.
He spots and defiles Linji.
He claims to be the direct descendant of great wisdom.
It's really unbearable.
Some of the people in authority are unforgiving.
They would only antagonize the diamond monks.

source_sentence: 慧文正辯佛日普照元叟端禪師語錄卷第六
translation: Huewen Zhengbian fori puzhao yuantsuo duan chanshi yulu, vol. 6
